metadataAttributes.Title: Managing Big Data in Clusters and Cloud Storage
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: In this course, you'll learn how to manage big datasets, how to load them into clusters and cloud storage, and how to apply structure to the data so that you can run queries on it using distributed SQL engines like Apache Hive and Apache Impala. You’ll learn how to choose the right data types, storage systems, and file formats based on which tools you’ll use and what performance you need.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Data Management,Distributed File Systems,Cloud Storage,Big Data,SQL,
